title: Business Calendar 2 v2.11.2 APK (Android)
description:
Feature Overview:
â–ª event planner and task management
â–ª month, week and day view
â–ª agenda with live search
â–ª year view
â–ª uses Android calendar sync which allows synchronization e.g. with Google Calendar and Exchange
â–ª support for local calendars and tasks
â–ª advanced event reminders
â–ª month, week, day, agenda and tasks widget

Details:
â–ª intuitive navigation with simple swipes between month, week and day
â–ª choose between text and bars in month view
â–ª quick glance on the event details in the popup directly from month view
â–ª freely scroll- and zoomable multi-day view (1-14 days)
â–ª quickly show and hide calendars with the favorite bar
â–ª integrated task organizer which syncs with Google Tasks
â–ª customizable notifications with direct actions (e.g. snooze reminder, show map, write email to attendees)
â–ª create meeting invites and handle meeting invitations easily
â–ª heat map in year view (e.g. to find free days) 
â–ª optional ongoing notification with event countdown
â–ª share your events and tasks
â–ª flexible recurrences
â–ª no ads

Customization:
â–ª customizable calendar and event colors
â–ª lots of settings to optimize the appearance and functionality of your widgets, events, tasks and reminders
â–ª adapt different views (day, week, month, year, agenda, tasks) to your personal needs
â–ª use pre-set widget themes or customize your widgets down to the very last detail.
â–ª live preview for all calendar widgets

Get Help:
â–ª build-in help system
â–ª quickly search our knowledge base if any questions arise

Business Calendar 2 is free and offers you a lot of features in its basic version. Additionally, you can get even more user-friendly features by upgrading directly from within the app. Users of the old Business Calendar Pro can access the pro features of Business Calendar 2 for free as long as the old app is installed.

Additional Pro Features:
â–ª integrated weather report in day view
â–ª easily move and copy events using drag&drop in multi-day view
â–ª event history, title & location auto-completion
â–ª link contacts to your appointments
â–ª easily create templates for new events
â–ª delete, move or copy multiple events at once using multi-selection
â–ª advanced options for appointment reminders (e.g. repeating alarms and individual ringtones for different calendars)
â–ª extended task features (e.g repeated tasks, subtasks and priorities)
â–ª automatically create a to-do for missed calls
â–ª light and dark theme
â–ª import and export calendar data (.ics, .ical)
â–ª more widget themes / advanced customization options for calendar widgets
â–ª individually configurable font sizes

Business Calendar is developed by a small, dedicated team in Berlin. Weâ€™re completely self-sustained to ensure stable and steady development cycles for you. Please consider supporting us by upgrading our calendar app and get more professional features right from within the app.

What's in this version : (Updated : 22 March 2016)
No recent changes
Required Android O/S : 4.0+
